job_details.duration: Contract for 2 years, potential to extend

jd: From: Avek, Absoluting avek@absoluting.com Reply to: avek@absoluting.com Role: Product Analyst/Business Analyst Visa Citizen, GC, H4/EAD Candidate must be within 1.5 hour drive to Marlborough, MA (REQUIRED!!) Candidate must have an active and an updated LinkedIn ID with current location updated (REQUIRED!!) HM Meeting Notes:• Potential to extend• Local talent only (about 1.5 hour away); will need to go in office for ad hoc workshops• Contract and contract to perm talent (funding only for 2 years but would consider the contractor if an FTE opened) What you’ll discover• Inclusive culture and career growth opportunities• Global IT Organization which collaborates across U.S., Canada, Europe, and Australia• Challenging, collaborative, and team-based environment Minimum Qualifications (Requirements)• 5-10 years’ experience as a Product Analyst or Business Analyst (Candidates Job Titles must be a Business Analyst or Product Analyst only)• Jira and Confluence (required)• Strong interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills• Presentation skills• Analytical skills• Ability to drive conversations with cross-functional teamsPreferred Qualifications• 1-3 years’ experience SAFe framework/Agile delivery method knowledge• Experience in the Loss Prevention field• Knowledge and experience with Loss Prevention applications: Genetec, Appriss or other Loss prevention software platforms• Familiarity with the retail industry & best practices• Experience working with vendors and 3rd party solutions• Experience working in a retail environment is desirable What you’ll doThe Loss Prevention (LP) Global Solution Delivery Team is responsible for managing solutions and technology that delivers capabilities to keep our associates and customers safe, preserve company assets, and provide business value. What you’ll needOur team is looking for people with a passion for delivering solutions, intellectual curiosity, and willingness to try new things. We are a collaborative culture and looking for somebody who enjoys meeting with and learning about how technology solves problems for our retail business. Key Responsibilities• Work to determine detailed requirements from key stakeholders for the team• Contribute to the Loss Prevention team’s backlog refinement, including user story point estimation and testing considerations• Articulate context around requirements and solutions, and work to build consensus within a stakeholder group• Work with and support the product team to achieve iteration goals and objectives• Ensure the functional integrity of the product/solution
